title: The Mill Girl
description: When Samantha left her family farm to work at the Lowell mills, she looked forward to having independence and being able to send money home to help her family. However, when she arrives, she learns that the Lowell mills aren't exactly what she expected. As Samantha learns more about Lowell from the other girls, she finds herself facing a difficult choice. Read The Mill Girl to find out what Samantha learns and how she makes her decision. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters and how to identify and create complex sentences.
